"Preset Ability Transfer":
"\"Preset Ability Transfer\" is a function at the Item Lab which allows you to transfer Preset Abilities from one item to another.

To perform Preset Ability Transfer onto an item, you need a Weapon or an Armor of the same name to use as material, which has a Preset Ability that you wish to transfer.

The Weapon or Armor used as material will be lost during this process."
